resources.string:
1- A piece is called a man.
 2- Pieces can only move diagonally, neither horizontally nor vertically.
 3- Capturing opponent's pieces is by jumping over them if there is an empty square behind them.
 4- When one of your pieces reaches your opponent's side of the board, it becomes a king and gets crowned.
 5- A king "crowned piece" can move and capture diagonally forward and backward.
 6- The winner who eliminates all of his opponent's pieces.
